paragraphs.context:
PROJECTS EXPERIENCE

Postura (Dec 2024)
• Developed an IoT system using ESP32-CAM for real-time streaming with OpenCV.
• Integrated Mediapipe for pose estimation, extracting landmark coordinates to analyze posture.
• Built two machine learning models for classifying good/bad posture and detecting normal posture, scoliosis, and lordosis.
• Created a web application using Flask for online posture monitoring.

Melanoma Detection (Dec 2024)
• Developed an application for detecting and analyzing melanoma types using OpenCV image processing and machine learning.
• Extracted image features for segmentation, edge detection, asymmetry, and color analysis.
• Built an inference interface with Streamlit for image upload and melanoma detection.

Fire Alarm with Opencv (Dec 2024)
• Developed a Python-based fire detection system using OpenCV and camera input.
• Implemented HSV thresholding to detect fire color.
• Integrated MQTT communication with Mosquitto broker; ESP32 communicated with the broker to trigger a warning light.

Kard AI (Nov 2024)
• Developed Kard AI, a web-based platform for early detection of cardiovascular disease risk using a Random Forest model.
• Integrated a fine-tuned FLAN-T5 chatbot to educate users on cardiovascular health and risk factors.
• Deployed the platform for personalized risk assessments and educational content.

Maize Pest Detection (Oct 2024)
• Developed a YOLOv11-based model for detecting maize pests using a filtered IP102 dataset.
• Achieved mAP of 84.3%, precision of 87.6%, and recall of 79.4%.
• Enabled real-time, targeted pest control for sustainable farming.

Emotion Classification (August 2024)
• Developed an emotion classification model using the FastJobs/Visual Emotional Analysis dataset.
• Fine-tuned a Google-ViT model, achieving 63.75% accuracy and a loss of 1.0965.
• The model was downloaded 237 times.

Gesture-Controlled Robot (August 2024)
• Developed a gesture-controlled robotic hand powered by an Arduino microcontroller.
• Used a servo-thread mechanism to control finger movements.
• Integrated OpenCV and Mediapipe for real-time hand tracking; angles detected controlled servo motors.
